item.title: How to Brew Coffee
item.description: History of Coffee Coffee has been around for centuries and it all began in Ethiopia with a goat herder named Kaldi. He noticed his goats getting hyper after eating some red berries and decided to try it himself. He found that it gave him energy too. The local monks found out about it and started using it to stay awake during long religious ceremonies. As word spread, coffee made its way to the Arab world and became a hit in places like Mecca and Medina.

item.title: My First Blog
item.description: “Welcome to Pour Over data blog” “Where coffee meets data!”
